non_goals: external dependency additions without security review
breaking changes to existing API contracts

epic1_closures.J: durability_policy.py: migration monotonicity + backup chain + retention + WAL enforcement
epic1_closures.M: durability_policy.py: SQLite connection durability assertions + composite report
epic1_closures.O: coverage_completeness.py: operational readiness sections mapped and gate-covered
epic1_closures.Q: coverage_completeness.py: privacy section mapped with gate + test + artifact coverage
epic1_closures.W: coverage_completeness.py: operations docs section mapped with gate + artifact coverage

epic2_closures.L: contract_trace.py + test_strategy_policy.py: contract consistency + trace propagation + strategy report
epic2_closures.N: observability_requirements.py: 5 telemetry types, field completeness + correlation continuity
epic2_closures.T: test_strategy_policy.py: section-to-test mapping + completeness check + negative coverage + duplicates
